title: H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet- Luyster SGC 20
author: barrysloate

posts.post_title: H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet- Luyster SGC 20
posts.post_content:
Seldom encountered Old Mill cabinet features Luyster of Fayetteville. This recent find is a new addition to the H801-7 checklist, and was unknown until last year. As such, it is almost certainly unique. Card exhibits general wear and creasing, as well as a spot of paper loss at the lower border, Fair condition. A rare type card.

CARD IS SOLD. THANK YOU. Free postage and insurance. Paypal please add 3%. Interested parties please email me at [url]bsloate@att.net[/url]. Thank you, Barry Sloate

Bumped for price reduction to $1750.

Come on everyone, this is a one-of-a-kind card! The silence is deafening!:)

posts.post_title: Re: H801-7 Old Mill Cabinet- Luyster SGC 20
posts.post_content: Terrific card, Barry. I'd be all over it if I wasn't trying to put two daughters through Catholic high school. Best of luck.
Thanks Ed. I think the economy is hitting everyone hard.

Barry, I love the card, but it's out of my price range.  Would you be open to a trade?  I don't have one thing to offer, but 3-4 things of $300-$500 value or so.  If nobody steps up, send me an e-mail if that sounds at all appealing and I can send a list or make an offer.

[url]sethgbernard@yahoo.com[/url]
Card has been sold. Thanks to all who made offers.  regards, Barry
